channel.title: Solar on CarbonGIS
channel.description: Recent content in Solar on CarbonGIS

item.title: 3D solar yield simulation
item.description: Part of a project for the Sustainable Energy Systems course at RMIT, this data visualisation quantifies the solar potential of an unusual roof configuration (a retirement home) by running irradiance simulation in the EnergyPlus engine, on a building envelope modelled in SketchUp.
